title: @Meddler question about Rek update
body:
Can we expect any changes to her burrowed Q AKA Prey Seeker? Right now it's an underwhelming ability with low damage and low utility. I feel like the projectile speed, audio, and range make it satisfying to land, but when you hit something, the actual effect is lackluster.

I understand that having it be more useful could overload the champ more, but it would be nice to atleast get a small buff.

replies.body: Sort of. Current changes in testing don't change Prey Seeker itself substantially but do offer a bit more combo with another part of her kit that makes it feel situationally quite a bit better. We don't have the budget to pump substantial power into Prey Seeker, we would like to make it feel more satisfying at least in some circumstances though.

Sorry to bother you but i am mastery 7 aatrox and wanted to ask some questions about the aatrox changes specifically his w. Why did you change the heal on blood thirst? Looking at the changes almost everything is fine, the blood changes are a good idea and gives him some power spikes and power weaknesses. But the change to his w seems absolutely horrid. Looking at the notes you didn't change the stats which would be fine, if he still had the sustain to not get bullied out of lane. Blood thirst is a very iconic part of the character and the immense sustain defined aatrox even though he was weak people still played him because of that one ability. It was the best feeling to be able to outduel someone by out healing them and it made him unique. The best it is, it was balanced and counterable, grievous wounds are a thing, the opponent had to make the decision if he had enough burst to take aatrox out so he was interactive. Why would you change that? all it does is make aatrox weaker and frankly your changes are more of a re-balance than anything else. You removed his health costs but also removed his sustain and attack speed which AATROX NEEDED to survive in lane with his absolute garbage stats. Is there any hope that the blood thirst changes will be reverted because aatrox at his core is a bruiser the reason why he couldn't build pure hp is because he hits like a wet noodle when he does. Changing the W to make him more of a tank is going to fix none of his problems and will make him frankly worse and less fun to play.

TDLR - like all the changes, bar his W blood thirst (the heal) Which will make him significantly weaker by allowing him to be bullied out of lane and removes the unique sustain of aatrox which makes him another generic fighter in this game.
